shortcuts for formatting properties

Source: R/shorcuts.R
shortcuts.Rd

Shortcuts for fp_text(), fp_par(), fp_cell() and fp_border().

Usage

shortcuts

Examples

shortcuts$fp_bold()
#>   font.size italic bold underlined color     shading fontname fontname_cs
#> 1        10  FALSE TRUE      FALSE black transparent    Arial       Arial
#>   fontname_eastasia fontname.hansi vertical_align
#> 1             Arial          Arial       baseline
shortcuts$fp_italic()
#>   font.size italic  bold underlined color     shading fontname fontname_cs
#> 1        10   TRUE FALSE      FALSE black transparent    Arial       Arial
#>   fontname_eastasia fontname.hansi vertical_align
#> 1             Arial          Arial       baseline
shortcuts$b_null()
#> line: color: black, width: 0, style: solid
